name: The Captain's Cabin: An Escape Room
name_original: The Captain's Cabin: An Escape Room
description:
This is a short escape room, created as a way to stave off boredom during Aotearoa's 2021 Level 4 Lockdown. Text and puzzles are created by me; images were built using the Sims 4 with some additional mods from TheSimsResource.com.

Works best on Google Chrome.
